segments.text: Hey , buddy . Are the fish biting today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They sure are . They are practically jumping in the boat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that so ? Well , what kind of bait are you using ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We're catching most of our fish with lures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Lures ? We're using live bait over here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of live bait are you using ? Worms or minnows ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're using worms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you having any luck with the worms ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , we haven't even gotten a nibble today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's too bad . Why don't you try using lures instead ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I would , but I don't have any in my tackle box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's too bad . Well , where are you fishing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm just fishing from the shore . How about you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We went out in our boat . I have a favorite fishing hole out there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sweet.Can you tell me where it is ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh no , I can't tell you . It's a secret . Say , why don't you go over by the lily pads and try fishing there ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think that's a good spot ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I used to catch my legal limit of bass there all the time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks . I think I'll go check that out now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good luck . I hope you each some fish .
segments.speaker: S2
